title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile missing MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the ajc compiler with the outjar option, the resulting JAR file does not contain the expected METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: The generated JAR file should include the required MANIFEST.MF file within the METAINF directory.
EB: Currently, when the outjar option is used, the resulting file is not a valid JAR file as it lacks the necessary MANIFEST.MF in the METAINF directory.
SR: Ensure that the ajc compiler, when used with the outjar option, correctly includes the MANIFEST.MF file within the METAINF directory of the generated JAR file.
